description: Main entry point and root widget setup for a Flutter app implementing a 2048 game, with theme and provider initialization.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget that sets up the provider and theme for the app.

classes.name: _RootScaffold
classes.description: Widget that provides the app's scaffold with gradient background and app bar.

classes.name: _ThemedWelcomeCard
classes.description: A styled card widget displaying welcome message and theme info.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main function that runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp widget, setting up provider and MaterialApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for _RootScaffold, creating gradient background and scaffold structure.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for _ThemedWelcomeCard, showing themed welcome message.
